channel.title: Steven's Conversations
channel.description: Investigations into the minds of interesting people.
channel.itunes:author: Steven ten Holder

item.title: 1: Navid Nathoo (ft. Nadeem Nathoo)
item.description: A sprawling conversation with Navid, founder of The Knowledge Society.
item.author: steve.tenholder@gmail.com

item.title: 2: Harry Ghandi
item.description: A mutual history conversation. Harry is a science entrepreneur I met many years ago at the University of Waterloo's Velocity incubator. We talk about entrepreneurship, our histories/experiences, and philosophy broadly.
item.author: steve.tenholder@gmail.com

item.title: 3: Paul Reginato
item.description: A sprawling conversation. Paul is a bioengineer I met many years ago within the University of Waterloo's iGEM team. We talk about the philosophy of environmentalism, attitudes toward death, the question of purpose, Elon Musk and more.
item.author: steve.tenholder@gmail.com

item.title: 4: Ryan Brown
item.description: A climate change debate. Ryan is a battery chemistry entrepreneur (co-founder, Salient Energy) and environmentalist I met many years ago at the University of Waterloo's Velocity startup incubator.
item.author: steve.tenholder@gmail.com

item.title: 5: Skyler Chan
item.description: A 'life direction' conversation. Skyler is a young crypto startup founder (currently @usesonder) from Vancouver.
item.author: steve.tenholder@gmail.com

item.title: 6: Cody Shirriff
item.description: A fun philosophical exploration of just about everything. Cody is a biotech founder and friend in Vancouver.
item.author: steve.tenholder@gmail.com
